title: Labasa leads youth soccer league play-off
content:
Update: 7:15PM LABASA has hit the lead in the Rewa Galaxy Youth League final play-off after beating Ba 1-0 today.

Striker, Mohammed Issac scored the lone goal at the Fiji Football Association academy ground in Vatuwaqa to help the northerners finish unbeaten in the play-off.

Labasa has four points after two matches, Rewa has one and Ba is at the bottom with no points.
